suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

messages.message:
Error: Cannot call impure function during render

`Math.random` is an impure function. Calling an impure function can produce unstable results that update unpredictably when the component happens to re-render. (https://react.dev/reference/rules/components-and-hooks-must-be-pure#components-and-hooks-must-be-idempotent).

  10 |

import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { MapPin, Navigation, Clock, Users, ShieldCheck, Smartphone, Globe, Layers, Cpu, Server, ArrowRight, Activity, HeartPulse, BrainCircuit } from 'lucide-react'; export default function Home() { return (
{/* 1. HERO SECTION */}
v2.0 Now Live with AI Navigation

Hospital Navigation
Reimagined.

Stop getting lost in complex medical facilities. MediMap uses 3D Visualization and AI Prediction to guide you from entrance to appointment with zero stress.

Find Your Hospital Patient Login
{/* Hero Visual Placeholder */}

SIMULATION PREVIEW

Interactive 3D Indoor Maps

{/* Decorative blobs */}
{/* 2. PROBLEM STATEMENT (5 Cards) */}

The Challenge

Why Hospitals Are Confusing

Complex layouts and stress make navigation difficult. MediMap solves these core issues.

} title="Lost in Corridors" desc="Patients wander for avg. 20 mins looking for rooms." /> } title="Late Arrivals" desc="30% of appointment delays are due to navigation issues." /> } title="High Stress" desc="Medical visits are already stressful without getting lost." /> } title="Crowded Areas" desc="Avoiding congested zones is impossible without real-time data." /> } title="Language Barrier" desc="Static signs don't adapt to the patient's language." />
{/* 3. TARGET USERS (4 Cards) */}

Built For Everyone

{/* 4. PROPOSED SOLUTION */}

The Intelligent Solution

We combine digital twin technology with probabilistic AI to create a living map of your hospital.

} /> } /> } />
{/* Mock UI for Solution */}

NavEngine Active

OPTIMAL PATH FOUND

{/* 5. VALUE DELIVERED (Stats) */}
{/* 6. TECHNOLOGY STACK */}

Powered By Modern Tech

} /> } /> } /> } /> } />
{/* 7. DEPLOYMENT BANNER */}

Enterprise Ready

Designed for scalability. Deployable on-premise or via cloud providers like AWS and Vercel. HIPAA compliant architecture.

{/* Footer */}
© 2024 MediMap Inc. All rights reserved.
